item.description:
“Ladies Night Out” Open House includes wine and cheese tasting, prizes, demonstrations, and exhibits from dozens of local businesses specializing in products & services perfect for the Holidays. All this, plus the official kick off of Mahoney’s incredible Christmas Shoppe, a must-see year after year!  
  • Holiday gifts for sale from 25 local merchants and artisans
  • Inspiring decoration ideas
  • New, unique ornaments and lifelike trees
  • Raffle Prizes
  • Wine tasting and food samplings
  • Live music
Participating Vendors:  
  • A Perfect Scarf
  • Miche Bags
  • Sparkles
  • Shoreway Acres
  • Oilio d’ Melli
  • Moonlight Rose Alpacas
  • Concord Hand Design
  • Green Eyed Daisy
  • Randa Glass
  • Decorative Art of Glass
  • Owens Corning
  • Whrily Girls
  • Silverbrook Farm
  • Sue Stones
  • Green Pond Fish
  • Soup Shack
  • Saparno’s
  • The Cape Cod Lady
  • Coastal Winery
  • Westport Rivers Winery

All Ladies Night Events are rain or shine. Also, remember to bring cash. Some vendors are unable to accept credit cards that night.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be where the wine is! A girl has to keep warm you know!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Mahoney's Garden Center 6th Annual Ladies Night Out in Falmouth
